full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 782 Filed 01/15/25 Page 120 of 158 120 LBAGmax4 Rocchio - Cross 1 Q. You also talked about delayed disclosures; correct? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Now, the studies vary over when disclosure occurs for a number of reasons. First, the definition of disclosure, the 4 studies have disclosures to law enforcement, right, which is 5 one definition of disclosure? 6 7 A. That's generally referred to in the literature as reporting. 8 9 Q. And then there's disclosure to a parent; right? 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. Then there's disclosure to a friend; right? 12 A. Mm-hmm. 13 Q. Disclosure to a teacher or other third person? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And there's really no set term of what disclosure in this 16 context means; correct? 17 A. No, that's not correct. 18 Q. There's also no set term on what delay means; correct? 19 A. No, that's not correct. 20 Q. Well, some of the studies have one week as delay; right? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. And some of the studies have one month as a delay; right? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. Some of the studies have one year as delay, up to one year; 25 right? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

1 Q. You also talked about delayed disclosures; correct? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Now, the studies vary over when disclosure occurs for a number of reasons. First, the definition of disclosure, the 4 studies have disclosures to law enforcement, right, which is 5 one definition of disclosure? 6 7 A. That's generally referred to in the literature as reporting. 8 9 Q. And then there's disclosure to a parent; right? 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. Then there's disclosure to a friend; right? 12 A. Mm-hmm. 13 Q. Disclosure to a teacher or other third person? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And there's really no set term of what disclosure in this 16 context means; correct? 17 A. No, that's not correct. 18 Q. There's also no set term on what delay means; correct? 19 A. No, that's not correct. 20 Q. Well, some of the studies have one week as delay; right? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. And some of the studies have one month as a delay; right? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. Some of the studies have one year as delay, up to one year; 25 right?
